segments.text: As I look closer, the potential hazards in this kitchen become very clear.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The overflowing sink is creating a serious slipping hazard.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The woman's foot is already in the water, yet she notices nothing.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I'm really worried she or one of the children could slip and fall.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: And that stool the boy is onâ€”it's incredibly unstable, ready to tip.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: A fall from there, possibly into the growing puddle, could be nasty.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: There's a high chance of broken dishes, and maybe even injuries.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The water damage to the cabinets and floor will be extensive too.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: It's frustrating to see such preventable accidents brewing.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: This whole situation is making me quite uneasy, honestly.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I feel disgusted by the sloppiness of the overflowing water.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: It's a chaotic mess waiting to happen, truly.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I wish I could warn them, but I'm merely an observer.
segments.speaker: PAR
